Foscarnet is approved for the treatment of CMV retinitis in patients with AIDS.
58 It has been used to treat other CMV diseases in immunocompromised patients, especially those unable to tolerate ganciclovir and those infected with ganciclovir-resistant virus.
60, 61 Foscarnet is also used for treating acyclovir-resistant mucocutaneous HSV and VZV in immunocompromised patients.
58 On rare occasion, it has been used for prevention of CMV in transplant recipients; however, its toxicity limits this clinical indication.
